tours.title: Hurghada: Morning Quad Bike & ATV Adventure Along a Red Sea
tours.description: Start your day with an exhilarating quad bike and ATV adventure across the Hurghada desert, with stunning views of the Red Sea mountains and coastline.
tours.longDescription: Kickstart your morning with an adrenaline-pumping quad bike and ATV adventure through the vast desert landscapes of Hurghada. This guided tour offers a perfect blend of excitement and scenic beauty, taking you across sandy plains and rugged terrain with the stunning Red Sea mountains as your backdrop. After a comprehensive safety briefing and a test drive, follow your expert guide into the desert for an unforgettable off-road experience. Feel the morning sun on your face as you navigate your vehicle, stopping at key viewpoints to capture incredible photos of the sea and desert. This tour is ideal for those looking to experience the thrill of the desert without committing to a full-day safari.
highlights: Exhilarating 2-hour quad bike and ATV ride
Stunning views of the Red Sea mountains and coast
Guided convoy for safety and exploration
Photo stops at panoramic desert viewpoints
Includes hotel pickup and drop-off
whatsIncluded: Hotel pickup and drop-off from Hurghada
Quad bike and ATV usage for approximately 2 hours
tours.meetingPoint: Hotel lobby pickup from Hurghada hotels.
tours.ageRestriction: Drivers must be at least 16 years old. Passengers can be younger if accompanied by an adult.
tours.cancellationPolicy: Free cancellation up to 24 hours before the tour start time.
whatToWear: Long pants and a light long-sleeved shirt are recommended
tours.physicalRequirements: A moderate level of physical fitness is required. Not recommended for pregnant women or individuals with back problems.
tours.transportationDetails: Round-trip transfers from Hurghada hotels are provided in an air-conditioned vehicle.
tours.mealInfo: No meals are included. Bottled water is provided.
tours.weatherPolicy: Operates in most weather conditions. May be rescheduled in case of severe sandstorms.
tours.photoPolicy: Photography is encouraged. Guides can assist in taking photos. Professional photo/video packages are available for purchase.
tours.tipPolicy: Tipping is customary in Egypt and appreciated for good service.
healthSafety: All participants receive a safety briefing.
Helmets are provided and mandatory.
Tours are led by experienced guides.
culturalInfo: Experience the natural beauty of the Egyptian desert landscape.
tours.seasonalVariations: Available year-round. Morning tours offer cooler temperatures, especially during the hot summer months.
localCustoms: Follow the guideâ€™s instructions at all times for safety.
tours.metaTitle: Hurghada Morning Quad & ATV Desert Adventure
tours.metaDescription: Book a thrilling 3-hour morning quad bike and ATV tour in the Hurghada desert with stunning Red Sea views. Includes hotel transfers and safety gear.

itinerary.title: Hotel Pickup
itinerary.description: Get picked up from your hotel in Hurghada in an air-conditioned vehicle.

itinerary.title: Arrival and Briefing
itinerary.description: Arrive at the quad bike center, receive your helmet, and get a safety briefing and instructions on how to operate the vehicle.

itinerary.title: Desert Ride
itinerary.description: Start your guided quad and ATV adventure, riding through the desert landscape and enjoying the views of the Red Sea mountains.

itinerary.title: Return to Base
itinerary.description: Conclude your ride and return to the quad bike center.

itinerary.title: Transfer Back to Hotel
itinerary.description: Board the vehicle for your return trip to your hotel in Hurghada.

tours.title: From Hurghada: Makadi Bay Horse Riding Tour
tours.description: Enjoy a scenic horse riding tour in Makadi Bay, cantering along the beautiful beach and exploring the tranquil desert landscapes with transfers from Hurghada.
tours.longDescription: Escape the city and experience the natural beauty of Makadi Bay on horseback. This tour, with convenient transfers from Hurghada, offers a memorable riding experience suitable for all levels. Whether you are a beginner or an experienced equestrian, our well-trained horses and expert guides ensure a safe and enjoyable adventure. Ride along the pristine shoreline of Makadi Bay, feeling the gentle sea breeze and listening to the sound of the waves. The tour also takes you into the serene desert, where you can admire the vast landscapes and the stunning contrast between the golden sands and the turquoise sea. Choose between a morning ride to enjoy the fresh air or a sunset ride for a truly magical and romantic experience.
highlights: Horse riding on the beautiful beaches of Makadi Bay
Explore the serene desert landscape on horseback
Suitable for all riding levels, from beginners to advanced
Well-trained Arabian horses and professional guides
Includes round-trip transfers from Hurghada
includes: Hotel pickup and drop-off from Hurghada
whatsIncluded: Round-trip transfers from your hotel in Hurghada
tours.meetingPoint: Hotel lobby pickup from Hurghada hotels.
tours.ageRestriction: Minimum age is typically 8 years old. Weight limits may apply.
tours.cancellationPolicy: Free cancellation up to 24 hours before the tour.
whatToWear: Long trousers and closed-toe shoes are essential for comfort and safety.
tours.physicalRequirements: Basic level of fitness required. Participants should be able to mount and sit on a horse.
accessibilityInfo: Not suitable for pregnant women or individuals with severe back problems.
tours.transportationDetails: Transfers are provided in an air-conditioned vehicle from Hurghada to the stables in Makadi Bay.
tours.mealInfo: No meals are included, but bottled water is provided.
tours.weatherPolicy: Rides are weather-dependent and may be rescheduled for safety in case of strong winds or storms.
tours.photoPolicy: You are welcome to take your own photos. Guides can also assist.
tours.tipPolicy: Tipping is appreciated for good service from your guide and stable staff.
healthSafety: Safety helmets are mandatory and provided.
A safety briefing is conducted before the ride.
Guides accompany riders at all times.
culturalInfo: Enjoy the experience of riding majestic Arabian horses, a significant part of the local culture.
tours.seasonalVariations: Sunrise and sunset rides are particularly beautiful and offer cooler temperatures during hotter months.
localCustoms: Listen to your guide's instructions for handling the horses.
tours.metaTitle: Makadi Bay Horse Riding from Hurghada | Beach & Desert
tours.metaDescription: Book a scenic horse riding tour in Makadi Bay with transfers from Hurghada. Ride on the beach and in the desert. Suitable for all levels. Book now!

itinerary.title: Hotel Pickup in Hurghada
itinerary.description: You will be picked up from your hotel in Hurghada and driven to the stables in Makadi Bay.

itinerary.title: Arrival and Preparation

itinerary.title: Beach and Desert Ride
itinerary.description: Begin your guided horse ride, starting along the beautiful coastline of Makadi Bay and then venturing into the peaceful desert.

itinerary.title: Return to Stables
itinerary.description: After your ride, return to the stables to dismount and bid farewell to your horse.

itinerary.title: Transfer Back to Hurghada
itinerary.description: Your driver will take you back to your hotel in Hurghada.

tours.title: Hurghada: Arabian Desert and Sea Horseback Adventure
tours.description: Experience the unique thrill of riding a majestic Arabian horse through both the stunning desert landscapes and into the shallow waters of the Red Sea.
tours.longDescription: Embark on an unforgettable equestrian adventure that combines the best of two worlds: the vast, golden desert and the sparkling Red Sea. Starting from a stable near Hurghada, you'll be paired with a beautiful and well-cared-for Arabian horse suited to your riding ability. Your expert guide will lead you first into the expansive desert, where you can marvel at the silence and the stunning mountain scenery. After your desert exploration, the tour heads to the coast for the highlight of the experience: riding your horse into the shallow, crystal-clear waters of the Red Sea. This magical moment, as your horse splashes through the waves, is perfect for photos and creates a memory that will last a lifetime. This tour is perfect for animal lovers and adventure seekers of all riding levels.
highlights: Ride a purebred Arabian horse
Explore both desert and sea landscapes
Unique experience of swimming with your horse in the Red Sea
Stunning photo opportunities
Suitable for beginners and experienced riders
includes: Hotel pickup and drop-off in Hurghada
Horse and all necessary equipment including helmet
tours.cancellationPolicy: Cancel up to 24 hours in advance for a full refund.
whatToWear: Long pants for riding, and shoes that can get wet or that you can take off for the sea portion.
tours.physicalRequirements: Riders should be in good physical condition. A weight limit of 95kg (210 lbs) applies.
accessibilityInfo: Not wheelchair accessible. Not recommended for those with back problems or who are pregnant.
tours.mealInfo: No meals included. Bottled water is provided.
tours.weatherPolicy: Subject to favorable weather conditions. If canceled due to poor weather, you will be given the option of an alternative date or full refund.
tours.photoPolicy: Guides are happy to take photos with your camera. Professional photos are often available for purchase.
tours.tipPolicy: Tips for your guide and the stable hands are greatly appreciated.
healthSafety: Helmets are mandatory.
All horses are well-trained and cared for.
Experienced guides ensure a safe experience.
culturalInfo: Experience the grace and power of the Arabian horse, a breed treasured in Egyptian culture for centuries.
tours.seasonalVariations: Sunset rides are especially popular for their beautiful lighting and cooler temperatures.
localCustoms: Follow your guide's instructions for interacting with the horses to ensure a safe and respectful experience.
tours.metaTitle: Hurghada Horse Riding: Desert & Sea Adventure
tours.metaDescription: Book an incredible horseback adventure in Hurghada. Ride through the desert and swim with your horse in the Red Sea. Perfect for all levels. Transfers included.

itinerary.title: Hotel Pickup
itinerary.description: Begin with a convenient pickup from your hotel in Hurghada.

itinerary.title: Arrival at Stables

itinerary.title: Desert Ride

itinerary.title: Return and Transfer

tours.title: Hurghada: 6-Hour Jeep Desert Safari, Dinner, and Show
tours.description: Embark on a 4x4 Jeep adventure into the Egyptian desert. Experience Bedouin culture, enjoy a camel ride, watch the sunset, and feast on a BBQ dinner with a traditional show.
tours.longDescription: Experience the vastness and beauty of the Eastern Desert on this exciting 6-hour Jeep safari from Hurghada. Your adventure begins in the afternoon as you're picked up and driven into the desert in a comfortable 4x4 vehicle. Feel the thrill as you travel over sand dunes and rugged terrain towards a traditional Bedouin village. Upon arrival, you'll be welcomed with traditional hospitality and tea. Learn about the Bedouin way of life, see how they bake their bread, and enjoy a short camel ride to experience the classic mode of desert transport. As dusk approaches, find a scenic spot to watch the spectacular desert sunset, as the sky transforms with vibrant colors. The evening culminates with a delicious open-buffet BBQ dinner, followed by a captivating show featuring belly dancing, Tanoura (whirling dervish), and folkloric performances under the starry sky.
highlights: Thrilling 4x4 Jeep ride across the desert
Visit a traditional Bedouin village and learn about their culture
Enjoy a camel ride in the desert
Witness a breathtaking desert sunset
Feast on a delicious BBQ buffet dinner
Be entertained by belly dancing and a Tanoura show
whatsIncluded: Hotel transfers from Hurghada in a 4x4 Jeep
Unlimited mineral water and soft drinks
whatsNotIncluded: Any extras not mentioned in the program
tours.meetingPoint: Hotel lobby pickup from Hurghada hotels.
tours.cancellationPolicy: Free cancellation up to 24 hours before the tour.
whatToBring: A light jacket for the evening
whatToWear: Comfortable, casual clothing and sturdy shoes.
tours.physicalRequirements: Minimal physical activity required. The Jeep ride can be bumpy.
accessibilityInfo: Not wheelchair accessible. Not recommended for those with severe back problems.
tours.transportationDetails: Travel is in a 4x4 Toyota Land Cruiser or similar vehicle.
tours.mealInfo: An open-buffet BBQ dinner is included, with a variety of grilled meats, salads, and local dishes. Soft drinks and water are included.
tours.weatherPolicy: Operates in most weather conditions. Sandstorms are rare but could lead to rescheduling.
tours.photoPolicy: Plenty of photo opportunities for the landscape, sunset, and activities. Ask for permission before photographing local people.
tours.tipPolicy: Tipping is a part of the culture and is appreciated for good service.
healthSafety: Experienced and licensed drivers.
Seatbelts must be worn in the vehicle.
First aid available.
culturalInfo: An excellent opportunity to learn about the semi-nomadic Bedouin tribes of the Eastern Desert.
tours.seasonalVariations: The desert can get cool in the evening, especially in winter (Nov-Mar), so bringing a jacket is recommended.
localCustoms: Dress modestly when visiting the Bedouin village.
Accepting tea is a sign of welcome and respect.
tours.metaTitle: Hurghada Jeep Safari with BBQ Dinner & Show

tours.title: Makadi Bay: Mega Tour Jeep, ATV, Buggy, Camel, Dinner & Show
tours.description: The ultimate desert adventure from Makadi Bay. This mega tour includes a Jeep safari, ATV quad biking, a dune buggy ride, a camel ride, and concludes with a Bedouin dinner and show.
tours.longDescription: Experience every thrill the desert has to offer in one action-packed day with the Mega Safari from Makadi Bay. This tour is perfect for adrenaline junkies and culture enthusiasts alike. Your adventure starts with a Jeep safari, taking you deep into the stunning landscapes of the Eastern Desert. Then, take the wheel yourself for an exhilarating ATV quad bike ride across the sands, followed by a powerful dune buggy experience. After the high-speed fun, slow down the pace with a traditional camel ride, just as the Bedouins have done for centuries. As the sun sets, relax in a Bedouin village, learn about their ancient culture, and enjoy a delicious BBQ dinner under the stars, accompanied by a mesmerizing traditional show of belly dancing and folklore. This comprehensive tour is the ultimate way to experience the Egyptian desert.
highlights: All-in-one desert adventure: Jeep, ATV, Dune Buggy, and Camel
Thrilling self-drive ATV and Buggy sessions
Scenic 4x4 Jeep safari through the desert
Cultural visit to a Bedouin village
Sunset BBQ dinner with live entertainment show
includes: All activities: Jeep, ATV, Buggy, Camel ride

tours.title: From Hurghada: Luxor Private Guided Tour
tours.description: Discover the treasures of ancient Thebes on a private, full-day tour to Luxor from Hurghada. Explore iconic sites like the Valley of the Kings and Karnak Temple with your own Egyptologist guide.
tours.longDescription: Journey back in time on an exclusive private day trip from Hurghada to Luxor, the world's greatest open-air museum. Traveling in a comfortable, private, air-conditioned vehicle, you'll have the undivided attention of your personal Egyptologist guide. Your first stop is the magnificent Karnak Temple, a vast complex of temples, pylons, and obelisks dedicated to the Theban gods. Next, cross the Nile to the West Bank to explore the necropolis. Visit the Valley of the Kings, where the tombs of pharaohs, including Tutankhamun, were discovered. Marvel at the stunning Temple of Hatshepsut, a terraced masterpiece built for Egypt's most famous female pharaoh. Finally, stop for photos at the colossal statues of Memnon. Lunch at a local restaurant overlooking the Nile is also included in this comprehensive and personalized tour.
highlights: Enjoy a fully private tour with a personal Egyptologist guide
Travel in a comfortable, private air-conditioned vehicle
Visit the East Bank's Karnak and Luxor Temples
Explore the West Bank's Valley of the Kings and Hatshepsut Temple
Includes lunch at a restaurant with Nile views
Flexible itinerary tailored to your interests
includes: Private hotel pickup and drop-off from Hurghada
Entrance fees to all mentioned sites
whatsIncluded: Private round-trip transfers from your Hurghada hotel
Entrance fees to Karnak Temple, Valley of the Kings (3 tombs), Hatshepsut Temple, and Colossi of Memnon
whatsNotIncluded: Entrance to Tutankhamun's tomb or other special tombs
Gratuities for the guide and driver
Optional felucca ride on the Nile
tours.meetingPoint: Private pickup from your hotel lobby in Hurghada.
tours.cancellationPolicy: Cancel up to 24 hours in advance for a full refund.
whatToWear: Light, comfortable clothing. Modest attire is recommended for temple visits.
tours.physicalRequirements: Involves a fair amount of walking and standing. Some sites have uneven ground.
accessibilityInfo: Can be adapted for those with mobility issues with advance notice, though some areas may be challenging.
tours.transportationDetails: Modern, private, air-conditioned car or minivan depending on group size.
tours.mealInfo: Lunch is included at a local restaurant, typically offering Egyptian cuisine. Drinks are extra.
tours.weatherPolicy: Tour operates year-round. Luxor can be very hot in summer, so an early start is planned.
tours.photoPolicy: Photography is allowed at most sites, but may be restricted inside tombs. A separate ticket is often required for cameras in the Valley of the Kings.
tours.tipPolicy: Tipping is an expected part of Egyptian culture. It is recommended to tip your guide and driver if you are happy with their service.
healthSafety: Travel in a private, sanitized vehicle.
Your private guide will ensure a safe and comfortable experience.
culturalInfo: Gain deep insights into ancient Egyptian history, religion, and architecture from your dedicated expert guide.
tours.seasonalVariations: The tour is available year-round, with very early morning departures from Hurghada to make the most of the day and avoid the midday heat.
localCustoms: Be respectful at religious and historical sites. Follow your guide's advice on local interactions.
tours.metaTitle: Private Luxor Day Trip from Hurghada | Valley of Kings
tours.metaDescription: Book a private guided tour to Luxor from Hurghada. Explore Karnak, Valley of the Kings, and more with your own Egyptologist and private vehicle. Lunch included.
keywords: valley of the kings private tour

itinerary.title: Early Morning Pickup from Hurghada
itinerary.description: Your private guide and driver will pick you up from your hotel for the journey to Luxor.

itinerary.title: Karnak Temple
itinerary.description: Arrive in Luxor and begin your exploration at the vast Karnak Temple Complex on the East Bank.

itinerary.title: Cross to the West Bank & Lunch
itinerary.description: Cross the Nile and enjoy a delicious lunch at a local restaurant with views of the river.

itinerary.title: Valley of the Kings

itinerary.title: Temple of Hatshepsut
itinerary.description: Visit the stunning, terraced temple of Queen Hatshepsut at Deir el-Bahari.

itinerary.title: Colossi of Memnon

itinerary.title: Return to Hurghada

tours.title: Hurghada: Dolphin Watching & Snorkeling w/ Private Transfer
tours.description: Embark on a private boat trip to the Dolphin House reef, where you can swim with wild dolphins in their natural habitat. Enjoy snorkeling stops and lunch on board.
tours.longDescription: Experience the magic of the Red Sea on an exclusive private boat trip designed for your group alone. This full-day excursion from Hurghada takes you to the renowned Dolphin House area, a protected reef famous for its resident pods of spinner dolphins. With a private charter, you have the flexibility to spend more time where you want, away from the crowds. Your day begins with a private transfer from your hotel to the marina. Once on board your private boat, you'll cruise to the Dolphin House. Here, you'll have the incredible opportunity to snorkel and swim with wild dolphins in a respectful and eco-friendly manner. The tour also includes stops at two other beautiful snorkeling sites to explore the vibrant coral reefs and diverse marine life of the Red Sea. A delicious lunch and soft drinks are prepared and served for you on the boat. This private tour is perfect for families, couples, or groups of friends seeking a personalized and unforgettable marine adventure.
highlights: Enjoy the exclusivity of a private boat for your group
Swim and snorkel with wild dolphins at Dolphin House reef
Explore two additional pristine snorkeling spots
Includes a delicious buffet lunch and drinks on board
Hassle-free with private hotel pickup and drop-off
whatsIncluded: Private round-trip hotel transfers in an air-conditioned vehicle
Private boat charter for the day
tours.meetingPoint: Private pickup from your hotel lobby in Hurghada.
tours.ageRestriction: Suitable for all ages. Strong swimming ability recommended for in-water dolphin encounters.
tours.cancellationPolicy: Cancel up to 24 hours in advance for a full refund.
tours.physicalRequirements: Swimming skills are required to snorkel. The boat is accessible for those with limited mobility to enjoy the cruise.
accessibilityInfo: Not wheelchair accessible for in-water activities.
tours.transportationDetails: Private air-conditioned vehicle for hotel transfers and a private boat for the sea excursion.
tours.mealInfo: A freshly prepared buffet lunch is served on board, with options typically including grilled chicken or fish, rice, pasta, salads, and bread.
tours.weatherPolicy: This is a weather-dependent activity. If cancelled due to poor sea conditions, an alternative date or a full refund will be offered.
tours.photoPolicy: You are free to take photos. The crew can also assist. Professional underwater photographers may be available as an add-on.
tours.tipPolicy: Tipping the boat crew and guide is customary if you are satisfied with the service.
healthSafety: Life jackets are available for all guests.
The crew is trained in first aid and safety procedures.
Snorkeling is always supervised by a guide.
culturalInfo: Learn about the marine ecosystem of the Red Sea and the importance of responsible wildlife tourism.
tours.seasonalVariations: Dolphin sightings are common year-round, but conditions are most pleasant from spring to autumn.
localCustoms: Interaction with dolphins is on their terms; touching or chasing the animals is strictly forbidden.
tours.metaTitle: Private Dolphin Watching & Snorkeling Trip from Hurghada
tours.metaDescription: Book an exclusive private boat tour to Dolphin House from Hurghada. Swim with wild dolphins, snorkel in beautiful reefs

itinerary.title: Private Hotel Pickup
itinerary.description: Your private vehicle will pick you up from your hotel in Hurghada for a transfer to the marina.

itinerary.title: Board Your Private Boat
itinerary.description: Meet your crew at the marina, board your private boat for the day, and set sail into the Red Sea.

itinerary.title: Arrival at Dolphin House
itinerary.description: Arrive at the Dolphin House reef. Your guide will brief you on how to safely interact with the dolphins before you get in the water to swim and snorkel with them.

itinerary.title: First Snorkeling Stop
itinerary.description: Cruise to a nearby coral reef for your first guided snorkeling session, exploring the vibrant underwater world.

itinerary.title: Lunch on Board
itinerary.description: Enjoy a delicious buffet lunch freshly prepared by the crew while you relax on the boat.

itinerary.title: Second Snorkeling Stop
itinerary.description: Visit another beautiful snorkeling spot to discover more of the Red Sea's diverse marine life.

itinerary.title: Sail Back to Marina
itinerary.description: Relax on the sundeck as you cruise back towards the Hurghada marina.

itinerary.title: Private Transfer to Hotel
itinerary.description: Upon arrival at the marina, your private vehicle will be waiting to take you back to your hotel.

tours.title: Hurghada: Orange Bay & Giftun Island, Snorkeling With Lunch
tours.description: Spend a day in paradise on a boat trip to Orange Bay and the Giftun Islands. Enjoy snorkeling in crystal-clear waters, relax on white sandy beaches, and savor a buffet lunch on board.
tours.longDescription: Escape to the 'Egyptian Caribbean' on this full-day boat trip from Hurghada to the stunning Orange Bay and Giftun Island National Park. Your day of sun and sea begins with a cruise across the turquoise waters of the Red Sea. You'll make two different stops for snorkeling at some of the best coral reefs in the region, where you can marvel at the incredible diversity of colorful fish and marine life. All snorkeling equipment is provided, and guides are on hand to assist you. The main highlight is a 2-hour stay at the beautiful Orange Bay on Giftun Island. Here, you can relax on the pristine white sand beach, swim in the shallow, calm waters, and soak up the tropical atmosphere. A delicious buffet lunch will be served on the boat. To add some extra fun, the trip concludes with a water sports activity like a banana boat ride before cruising back to the marina.
highlights: Relax on the beautiful white sand beach of Orange Bay
Spend 2 hours on Giftun Island
Enjoy two snorkeling stops at vibrant coral reefs
Savor a buffet lunch and soft drinks on the boat
Experience fun water sports like a banana boat ride
whatsIncluded: 2 snorkeling stops with equipment (mask, snorkel, fins)
2-hour stay at Orange Bay, Giftun Island
Water, soft drinks, coffee, and tea
whatsNotIncluded: National Park admission fee ($5 per person, payable on the day)
Transfers from outside Hurghada (available for an extra fee)

Snorkeling activities are supervised by guides.
The crew is trained in first aid.
culturalInfo: Learn about the delicate ecosystem of the Red Sea's coral reefs and the importance of their preservation.
tours.seasonalVariations: A fantastic year-round activity, with the water being warm enough for swimming even in winter.
localCustoms: Be mindful of the fragile coral reefs; do not touch or stand on them.
tours.metaTitle: Orange Bay & Giftun Island Snorkeling Trip from Hurghada
tours.metaDescription: Book a full-day boat tour to Orange Bay and Giftun Island from Hurghada. Enjoy snorkeling, a sandy beach, lunch on board, and water sports.

itinerary.title: Hotel Pickup
itinerary.description: Get picked up from your hotel in Hurghada and transferred to the marina.

itinerary.title: Set Sail & First Snorkel Stop
itinerary.description: Board the boat and cruise to the first snorkeling spot to explore the colorful underwater world.

itinerary.title: Second Snorkel Stop
itinerary.description: Move to a second, different reef for another chance to snorkel and see diverse marine life.

itinerary.title: Lunch on Board
itinerary.description: Enjoy a delicious buffet lunch served on the boat while cruising towards Giftun Island.

itinerary.title: Relax at Orange Bay
itinerary.description: Arrive at Orange Bay on Giftun Island. Spend two hours relaxing on the white sandy beach, swimming, and enjoying the beautiful scenery.

itinerary.title: Water Sports Fun
itinerary.description: On the way back, enjoy a fun ride on a banana boat or other inflatable water sports.

itinerary.title: Return to Marina
itinerary.description: Cruise back to the marina in Hurghada.

itinerary.title: Transfer to Hotel
itinerary.description: Upon arrival, you will be transferred back to your hotel.

tours.title: 3-Hour Sinbad Submarine Red Sea Tour from Hurghada
tours.description: Explore the underwater wonders of the Red Sea without getting wet! Descend 22 meters below the surface in the Sinbad Submarine to see coral reefs and colorful fish.
tours.longDescription: Embark on a unique underwater adventure aboard the Sinbad Submarine, the only real submarine in the Middle East. This tour is perfect for all ages, especially families and those who don't swim, offering a window into the vibrant marine life of the Red Sea. Your journey begins with a transfer to the pier, followed by a short cruise to the submarine's launch point. Once you board the spacious, air-conditioned submarine, you will descend to a depth of 22 meters. Through large panoramic windows, you'll be treated to spectacular views of the underwater world. Watch as divers attract colorful fish to your window and marvel at the intricate coral gardens. It's an unforgettable experience that feels like stepping into a natural aquarium.
highlights: Descend 22 meters below the Red Sea in a real submarine
See stunning coral reefs and diverse marine life through panoramic windows
Air-conditioned cabin with comfortable seating for 44 passengers
Perfect for families, children, and non-swimmers
Includes hotel pickup and drop-off from Hurghada
whatsIncluded: Hotel pickup and drop-off from Hurghada
tours.cancellationPolicy: Free cancellation up to 24 hours in advance.
tours.physicalRequirements: Minimal physical fitness is required. Must be able to step in and out of the submarine.
tours.mealInfo: No meals or drinks are included.
tours.weatherPolicy: Operates in most sea conditions. May be cancelled in case of very rough seas.
tours.photoPolicy: Photography through the windows is encouraged.
healthSafety: The submarine is fully certified and equipped with all necessary safety features.
A safety briefing is provided before the dive.
culturalInfo: An educational experience about the Red Sea's marine ecosystem.
tours.seasonalVariations: A great year-round activity, unaffected by air temperature.
tours.metaTitle: Sinbad Submarine Tour in Hurghada | Red Sea Underwater
tours.metaDescription: Book a 3-hour tour on the Sinbad Submarine in Hurghada. Dive 22 meters to see coral reefs and fish without getting wet.

itinerary.title: Hotel Pickup
itinerary.description: You will be picked up from your hotel in Hurghada and transferred to the submarine pier.

itinerary.title: Boarding and Cruise
itinerary.description: Board a vessel that will take you to the offshore submarine platform.

itinerary.title: Submarine Dive
itinerary.description: Board the Sinbad Submarine and descend 22 meters below the surface for approximately 50 minutes to view the stunning underwater world.

itinerary.title: Return to Pier
itinerary.description: The submarine surfaces, and you'll cruise back to the pier.

itinerary.title: Transfer Back to Hotel
itinerary.description: Your vehicle will be waiting to transfer you back to your hotel in Hurghada.

tours.title: Giza: Female Guided Pyramids and Egyptian Museum Tour
tours.description: Explore Egypt's ancient wonders with a unique perspective on this private tour led by a female Egyptologist guide, perfect for solo female travelers, couples, and families.
tours.longDescription: Discover the iconic landmarks of ancient Egypt in a comfortable and empowering environment with our exclusive female-guided tour. This private experience is specially designed for solo female travelers, families, or anyone who prefers the unique insights and perspective a female guide can offer. Your personal Egyptologist will lead you through the wonders of the Giza Plateau, where you'll stand in awe of the Great Pyramids and the enigmatic Sphinx. Learn about the pharaohs, their beliefs, and the incredible feats of engineering that created these lasting monuments. The tour continues to the world-renowned Egyptian Museum in Tahrir Square, home to an immense collection of artifacts, including the priceless treasures of King Tutankhamun. Throughout the day, your guide will share stories not just of kings and gods, but also of the powerful queens and everyday women of ancient Egypt, offering a fresh and engaging narrative. Enjoy the day at your own pace, with a private vehicle and a guide dedicated to making your experience safe, insightful, and unforgettable.
highlights: A private tour led by a licensed female Egyptologist guide
A comfortable and safe environment, ideal for solo female travelers
Explore the Great Pyramids of Giza and the Sphinx
Discover the treasures of King Tutankhamun at the Egyptian Museum
Gain unique insights into the role of women in ancient Egypt
Includes private air-conditioned transport and hotel pickup/drop-off
whatsIncluded: Pickup and drop-off from your hotel in Cairo or Giza
Private transportation in an air-conditioned vehicle
Entrance fees for the Giza Pyramids area and the Egyptian Museum
whatsNotIncluded: Entrance fee to the interior of the Pyramids
Mummy Room ticket at the museum
tours.meetingPoint: Private pickup from your hotel lobby in Cairo or Giza.
tours.cancellationPolicy: Free cancellation up to 24 hours in advance.
whatToWear: Lightweight, modest clothing. Comfortable shoes are a must.
tours.physicalRequirements: Involves walking on sandy and uneven surfaces.
accessibilityInfo: Can be customized for accessibility needs upon request.
tours.mealInfo: Lunch at a good quality local restaurant is included (drinks not included).
tours.photoPolicy: Photography is allowed, but extra tickets may be required for cameras inside some sites like the Egyptian Museum.
tours.tipPolicy: Tipping is a common practice and is appreciated for good service.
healthSafety: Travel with a professional, vetted female guide in a private vehicle.
A safe and comfortable experience is prioritized.
culturalInfo: This tour provides a special focus on the history and influence of women throughout Egyptian history, from queens to commoners.
tours.seasonalVariations: Available year-round. It can be very hot in the summer, so morning starts are recommended.
localCustoms: Your guide will provide advice on navigating cultural norms and interacting with vendors.
tours.metaTitle: Female-Guided Tour of Giza Pyramids & Museum
tours.metaDescription: Book a unique private tour of the Giza Pyramids and Egyptian Museum led by an expert female Egyptologist guide. Perfect for solo female travelers and families.

itinerary.title: Hotel Pickup
itinerary.description: Your private female guide will meet you at your hotel in Cairo or Giza to begin your tour.

itinerary.title: Giza Pyramids and Sphinx
itinerary.description: Explore the Giza Plateau, visit the three Great Pyramids, and marvel at the Sphinx. Your guide will share historical facts and stories, with a special focus on the queens of the era.

itinerary.title: Lunch Break
itinerary.description: Enjoy a delicious lunch at a local restaurant.

itinerary.title: Egyptian Museum
itinerary.description: Visit the Egyptian Museum in Tahrir Square to see the world's largest collection of Pharaonic antiquities, including the golden treasures of Tutankhamun.

itinerary.title: Return to Hotel
itinerary.description: Your guide will accompany you back to your hotel at the end of the tour.
